name: Errata
description:
You received a mysterious request.
Errata, a world governed by an unknown machine is on the brink of destruction.
The machinery is broken and eroded, rendering reality unstable. 

Only you can fix this by exploring this bizarre land. 

This game was made as part of "Turniej Trójgamiczny" - a game-making contest subsidized by the Polish Government. 

Currently available only in Polish, but an English localization is in the works and will see the light of day soon.
